org.janusproject.acl

Class ACLMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.janusproject.acl.ACLMessage

  • public class ACLMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class precises the minimal set of attributes required by an ACL Message to be sent and received.
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: madeline$, $Author: kleroy$, $Author: ptalagrand$, $Author: ngaud$
    See Also:
    FIPA ACL Message Structure Specification

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ACLMessage.Content
      This inner-class represents the content of the ACL Message.
      static class  ACLMessage.Envelope
      This inner-class represents the envelope of the ACL Message.

      • setOntology

        public final void setOntology(java.lang.String ontology)
        Sets the ontology of the ACL Message.

        In many situations, the ontology parameter will be commonly understood by the agent community and so this message parameter may be omitted.

        Parameters:
        ontology -
